In England, in the seven days to 10 December, there were 27,830 new confirmed cases (49.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 December, there were 23,749 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 17% (4,081 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 December is 20,350,226 (35,986.2 cases per 100,000 population).
